Online Music Application Form

If you intend to apply for Fall 2012 entrance to a music programme at Mount Allison, please submit this Music Application Form by Monday, February 13, 2012. The form will go by e-mail to the Music Department. (In completing this form, you must answer the questions marked with asterisks ( * ); the form will not submit with these boxes left blank.)

You must also make a general application for admission to Mount Allison University.

Audition / Interview / Extrance Assessment Information

Please read the Applications to Music Programmes page of this Web site before completing the following section.
  • All applicants for the B.Mus. programme must have a performance audition, as must those applicants for the B.A. (Honours or Major in Music) programmes who wish to be considered for Applied Music courses.
  • All applicants for B.Mus. and B.A.(Honours or Major in Music) should have a short interview with a member of our faculty. An interview is not required for the Minor in Music programme.
  • Applicants to all programmes must take the written Entrance Assessment. (Applicants for the Minor in Music programme may write the Assessment when they arrive at Mount Allison in the fall, or do the Assessment by mail.)
When do you propose to visit Mount Allison for your Audition / Interview / Entrance Assessment?
